Package mudServer.Commands.Emotes

Class Summary
Beg Allows a player to beg The String following the Beg command is displayed to all users in the room.
Bow Allows a player to bow The String following the Bow command is displayed to all users in the room.
Cry Allows a player to cry The String following the Cry command is displayed to all users in the room.
Dance Allows a player to dance The String following the Dance command is displayed to all users in the room.
Flex Allows a player to flex The String following the Flex command is displayed to all users in the room.
Kiss Allows a player to kiss The String following the Kiss command is displayed to all users in the room.
Laugh Allows a player to laugh The String following the Laugh command is displayed to all users in the room.
Point Allows a player to poins The String following the Point command is displayed to all users in the room.
Salute Allows a player to salute The String following the Salute command is displayed to all users in the room.
Smile Allows a player to Smile The String following the smile command is displayed to all users in the room.
Wave Allows a player to wave The String following the Wave command is displayed to all users in the room.
Wink Allows a player to wink The String following the Wink command is displayed to all users in the room.
